Text.name: Text0
Text.content: When adding a new job or editing an existing job, a form appears.You provide information necessary for every job, and optionally parameters handed over to the Java class that executes the job.

Image.Title: Dialog for editing a scheduled job (page 1)

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: In the dialog, as shown in the screenshot above you can fill out the following options for the job.
